mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_posts (title, content, view_count, created_by, created_at, category_id, user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, 0, #{createdBy}, #{createdAt}, #{freePostCategory.id}, #{user.id});
mapper.select:
SELECT p.id AS post_id, p.title AS post_title, p.content AS post_content, p.view_count AS post_view_count, p.created_by AS post_created_by, p.created_at AS post_created_at,
c.id AS category_id, c.name AS category_name,
a.id AS attachment_id, a.logical_name AS attachment_logical_name, a.stored_name AS attachment_stored_name, a.stored_path AS attachment_stored_path, a.extension AS attachment_extension, a.size AS attachment_size,
cm.id AS comment_id, cm.content AS comment_content, cm.created_by AS comment_created_by, cm.created_at AS comment_created_at,
u.id AS user_id
FROM free_posts p LEFT JOIN free_categories c ON p.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN free_attachments a ON p.id = a.post_id LEFT JOIN free_comments cm ON p.id = cm.post_id LEFT JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM free_posts p INNER JOIN free_categories c ON p.category_id = c.id
